p: Chromium (VI) oxide (CrO 3) (3.5 g, ACS reagent, â‰¥98%, Sigma-Aldrich, United States) was diluted with H 2O (5 mL). The mixture was cooled on ice, and 98% H 2SO 4 (3 mL) (JTBaker, Avantor, United States) was added at a constant drip. Then, the mixture was diluted with H 2O (10 mL) and stirred to obtain a solution corresponding to Jones reagent (18 mL) ( Meinwald et al., 1973).
